Name: Apocalyptic
About the game: About this Game Apocalyptic is zombie survival shooter video game. It reaches the quality you expect from a good experience while adhering to some of the aesthetic technical limits of older hardware. The game features a hand-crafted campaigns made by the developers. Keys Keys are around every map to unlock new areas and you may save at anytime hit walk on on of our checkpoints which will be shown by text. Checkpoints Checkpoints are reached when you make a lot of progress through each map and will be automatically saved but make sure you save when completing each level or it wont save and you will have to do it all over again from the checkpoint save. Common Infected [More will be added in DLC Packages] Common - Zombies and Explosive Zombies Developer Console Press ` or ~ to use and close the developer console cheat commands - type /help to access all commands HealthBox [Kit] Press E to heal Syringe Shot Syringes give you extra temp health and you also get extra acceleration when running. Inventory System You can store items in your inventory by pressing B Health Decay System You will lose health over 1000 hp Adding soon 1. 4 player Coop Campaign 2. 4V4 Versus mode [Casual & Competitive Ranked Mode [MMR based] ]
